text: Dono darwazay ki taraf doray aur uss aurat ney yousuf ka kurta peechay ki taraf say kheench ker phaar dala aur darwazay kay pass hi aurat ka shohar dono ko mill gaya to kehney lagi jo shaks teri biwi kay sath bura irada keray bus uss ki saza yehi hai kay ussay qaid ker diya jaye ya aur koi dard naak saza di jaye
